item.title: Channels
item.description: A channel defines one or more method of delivering alert notifications to external systems. Notification Delivery Channels Email Channel One or more email address (comma separated) that will receive messages from alerts@trustgrid.io PagerDuty Channel Trustgrid will generate an incident via the PagerDuty API if provided a valid API routing key. To procure a routing key, create a service in PagerDuty and add an Events API V2 integration. After adding the integration, the Integration Key is your API routing key.
